data.message: So, I just was contacted by a supposed Facebook employee claiming that I had won a Facebook prize drawing. The hole thing sounds like a scam. Now this individual: Janet Cook Jimenez is asking for my personal information for verification purposes. Does anyone have any further information?

replies.message: Hi Chris. Our team is aware of this hoax campaign. Please disregard the message and be sure not to release any personal or financial information to the sender. Thanks for checking in with us! -William
Facebook Thanks guys. just needed some reassurance.
